scenes.description: FLOW GLOW performs their song 'MAKE IT, BREAK IT' on the 3D stage.
Closing MC section where the members thank the audience and strike a pose.
End card with handwritten messages from the members and credits.

subtitles.original: ゼン！チャンスもセットだ　トウ！
subtitles.english: Zen! A chance is set, ten!

subtitles.original: ゼン！昇り上げる　チョウ！
subtitles.english: Zen! Rising up to the peak!

subtitles.original: ゼン！座布団踏んで　キショウ！
subtitles.english: Zen! Stepping on the cushion, rise!

subtitles.original: 乗り込め FG ロードスター　特殊部隊集合　能力者
subtitles.english: Board the FG Roadster, Special Forces assemble, power users

subtitles.original: この歴史の名を彫る　彫刻家　ぶっちぎりで置き去り　観測車
subtitles.english: Sculptors carving their names into this history, leaving observers in the dust

subtitles.original: 今高速でぶち抜いてく　大気圏
subtitles.english: Now piercing through the atmosphere at high speed

subtitles.original: エンジンからジェットの炎　揺れている　快気へ
subtitles.english: Jet flames from the engine, flickering towards recovery

subtitles.original: 眼下に広がる大地　超えていく　回帰線
subtitles.english: Crossing the Tropic, over the land spread out below

subtitles.original: バックミラーに　ビッグブルーが映ってる　IPFY
subtitles.english: Big Blue reflected in the rearview mirror, IPFY

subtitles.original: ぶち上げたいから　飛んでく　うちら世代
subtitles.english: Our generation taking off because we want to blast off

subtitles.original: この燃料　朽ち果てない　ガス欠なし　寿司食べたい
subtitles.english: This fuel won't run out, no running out of gas, I want to eat sushi

subtitles.original: 見据えてる　絶対　美徳　燃えてるメンバー　一同
subtitles.english: Gazing at absolute virtue, all members burning bright

subtitles.original: タライも　現在進行形　超えてく　世界規模
subtitles.english: The tub is also in progress, crossing to a world scale

subtitles.original: 叶うはずだ　WASSA　心臓が　MONSTER
subtitles.english: It must come true, WASSA! My heart is a MONSTER

subtitles.original: エイリアン　時代になれ　FG PARTY HARD
subtitles.english: Become an alien era, FG PARTY HARD

subtitles.original: 光る　TESLA ROADSTER　HEAVY BOOSTER
subtitles.english: Glowing Tesla Roadster, Heavy Booster

subtitles.original: 目覚めていく　本能　青い炎
subtitles.english: Awakening instinct, blue flame

subtitles.original: BFF　レッツゴーアウト　トゲ抜きな　ゼロから
subtitles.english: BFF, let's go out, pull out the thorns from zero

subtitles.original: 空まで　囚われ　走る　FG ロードスター
subtitles.english: Captured all the way to the sky, racing FG Roadster

subtitles.original: 唸る　ブースター　ログロの　STAYS TO BE
subtitles.english: Roaring booster, FLOW GLOW's stays to be

subtitles.original: 今　CHANGE TO ME
subtitles.english: Now change to me

subtitles.original: 超弩級スーパーカー　ハンドルさばきは　玄人ハン
subtitles.english: Super-dreadnought supercar, pro steering handling

subtitles.original: 爆走　重装　チューバッカ　次元が違う連中　バッカー
subtitles.english: Roaring heavy-duty Chewbacca, a crowd from a different dimension

subtitles.original: A-GO-NA　攻めてる　ギリギリ　モーター全開　ジリジリ
subtitles.english: A-GO-NA attacking at the limit, motor at full throttle, on edge

subtitles.original: ソーナー感知　ビキビキ　お肌ピチピチ
subtitles.english: Sonar detection throbbing, skin looking fresh

subtitles.original: タイヤ焦がして　ドーナツターン　弾け飛んでく　ドラム缶
subtitles.english: Burning tires in a donut turn, drum cans flying off

subtitles.original: 顧客満足度高くて　ブチ上がってる　お客さん
subtitles.english: High customer satisfaction, the audience is hyped

subtitles.original: ゼロから最高到達点　足りてる　太陽光発電
subtitles.english: Highest point from zero, enough solar power generation

subtitles.original: 探索する　この小惑星　超覚醒　突入　ボーナス点
subtitles.english: Exploring this asteroid, super awakening, entering bonus points

subtitles.original: 一直線　伸びてる　ターボ　バイブレーション　MCのカード
subtitles.english: Turbo vibration stretching in a straight line, MC's card

subtitles.original: 速度増し　上がってる　駆動　限界重力　凌駕し　上昇
subtitles.english: Drivetrain speeding up, surpassing limit gravity, rising

subtitles.original: 開拓し　向かってく　フロンティア　旅立つ　ロードスター　オンリーワン
subtitles.english: Opening up the frontier, Roadster departing, only one

subtitles.original: アクセル踏み込んでく　ドンピシャ　飛んでく　一番星
subtitles.english: Stepping on the accelerator perfectly, flying to the evening star

subtitles.original: 1億馬力の　中継点　火星のホテルが　休憩所
subtitles.english: Relay point of 100 million horsepower, a hotel on Mars as a rest area

subtitles.original: 並んで走行　UFO　降り立つ　宇宙ステーション
subtitles.english: Driving alongside UFOs, landing at the space station

subtitles.original: 物語は　継承　エイ！まるで　旧約聖書　エイ！
subtitles.english: The story is passed on, hey! Like the Old Testament, hey!

subtitles.original: この先何世紀も　成長　生き延びて　結果　ステイゴールド
subtitles.english: Growing for centuries to come, surviving results, Stay Gold

subtitles.original: 叶うはずだ　WASSA　心臓が　MONSTER
subtitles.english: It must come true, WASSA! My heart is a MONSTER

subtitles.original: 以上、私たち、FLOW GLOWでしたー！
subtitles.english: That's all from us, FLOW GLOW!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございましたー！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: みんなのおかげで3Dだん！これからもよろしくね
subtitles.english: Thanks to everyone, we're in 3D! Please continue to support us

subtitles.original: これからも皆と楽しいこと、新しいスタート！！
subtitles.english: Doing fun things with everyone from now on, a new start!!
